page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: SCHOOL DAY. We arrive 8.45 am by coach.School starts 9.00am, with assembly and prayers. Infants go straight to class. First lesson probably maths till 10.30 break,when boys play football or cricket, girls rounders,or practice netball shooting or skate.After break we continue with maths, or English, perhaps till lunch. Children bring sandwiches or eat school lunches cooked and served here. A roast dinner or mashed potatoes,meat,salad, chips,stew,vegetables,fish cakes burger; puddings are e.g chocolate/ apple/rhubarb crumble,(peppermint) custard,flapjack,jelly,fresh fruit. Afternoon studies include e.g team games,netball,soccer,rounders,cricket, and art/craft work,particularly as part of history, geography, science. School ends at 3.30 p.m.
